version_description:
v1.0.1
- Added a support/feature request e-mail option in Settings (please feel free to hit us up with any fun ideas or any problems you're having)
- Fixed a pesky crash that occurred if Airplane Mode was turned on or the connection became extremely weak
- Graph & display improvements in Altfolio & Coin Detail screens

Potential Future Additions:
- Today Extension
- Open ShapeShift to Buy/Sell coins directly from coin alerts
- Apple Watch App

v1.0.2
- Fixed a rare crash

Have a suggestion or problem? Use the feature request/support e-mail option in the Settings View!

Potential Future Additions:
- Today Extension
- Open ShapeShift to Buy/Sell coins directly from coin alerts
- Apple Watch App

v1.0.3
- Altfolio percentage change label now changes based on time length selected
- Fixed a rare crash that occurred when trying to delete some alerts
- Fixed a settings display issue on the iPhone 4 (go 5 years old phones!)
- Performance tweaks

Have a suggestion or problem? Use the feature request/support e-mail option in the Settings View!

Potential Future Additions:
- Today Extension
- Open ShapeShift to Buy/Sell coins directly from coin alerts
- Apple Watch App

v1.0.4
- Our bad, you're once again able to use the Altfolio functions. We got a little overzealous with optimizations and broke some stuff!

This version adds native iPad support!!!

- Dashboard - a new iPad-only feature. Show charts and trades of your favorite coins all on one screen!
- Bug Fixes
- UX/UI Tweaks

v1.0.6
This version will fold your laundry for you!! Only kidding, we’re just fixing a crash.

v1.0.5
This version added native iPad support!!!

- Dashboard - a new iPad-only feature. Show charts and trades of your favorite coins all on one screen!
- Bug Fixes
- UX/UI Tweaks

- Added support to see prices in various currencies around the world
- Fixed a bug where users couldn't use commas as the decimal separator in Altfolio values

TL;DR: In our efforts to add new stuff we messed up some other stuff, so much stuff... Alas, stuff should be unstuffed!

Technical Terms: Some users with TouchID were experiencing a crash on launch, that was a tough one to find but now should be 100% resolved because hey, no one likes crashes, us especially!

(The one other crash we're aware of and have fixed in a separate build but we wanted the launch crash fixed and out ASAP!)

v1.0.7
- Added support to see prices in various currencies around the world
- Fixed a bug where users couldn't use commas as the decimal separator in Altfolio values
Bug Fixes
UI & UX Improvements in the Alert Center

iOS 10 Users hold off on this update, some iOS 11 UI tweaks have gone too far so some views will look funny if you update. We have a new build that fixes this issue, it's already in Apple's hands, 1.3.1 is what you'll want to get!

- First off, after a long hiatus, ALERTS are working again!!! Pardon us for taking so long to implement a new server for these. We've been very busy but we've been dedicating a lot of time on work behind the scenes so that we can add in more features soon!
- Secondly, some spoke, we listened. Faster Intro Animation: We could remove it entirely but then you'd be staring at a blank screen waiting on data, and that's no fun!
- Tertiary... Really, enough with the counting, this coder disguising himself as a changelog writer shall be sacked presently! ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

- New Sort Option: Now you can sort coins via their Market Cap by their % Change
- Improved UX: For new users (we can wait to ask about a passcode & push notifications)
- Improved UX: You can now view what percentage of an altfolio is made up from each coin it contains
- Improved UX: Tapping "Add A Coin" in the Altfolio View has a much better flow. It now allows the next coin you tap on to be added to that particular altfolio as well as specifying the exact amount if you have the option turned on. If you don't go check out the Settings view in the app, there's some handy settings in there!
- Improved UX: Anytime you add a coin to an altfolio we detect if you already have that coin in there and show you the advanced controls for updating the current value.
- You've always been able to swipe on coin rows in every view, now we show a little reminder for new users (coming soon, a full tutorial mode for those who want it!)
- More data, more often. Now when you tap on a coin we'll grab that latest data for you, not all coins have socket data so no flashies but this should help make up for that and prevent you from having to do a pull to refresh for a particular coin.

Meh:
- Bug fixes
- Speed Improvements
- iOS 11 UI Fixes

Cheers,
The ShapeShift Gang

Now with iOS 10 and Windows XP compatibility...

- First off, after a long hiatus, ALERTS are working again!!! Pardon us for taking so long to implement a new server for these. We've been very busy but we've been dedicating a lot of time on work behind the scenes so that we can add in more features soon!
- Secondly, some spoke, we listened. Faster Intro Animation: We could remove it entirely but then you'd be staring at a blank screen waiting on data, and that's no fun!
- Tertiary... Really, enough with the counting, this coder disguising himself as a changelog writer shall be sacked presently! ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

- New Sort Option: Now you can sort coins via their Market Cap by their % Change
- Improved UX: You can now view what percentage of an altfolio is made up from each coin it contains
- Improved UX: Tapping "Add A Coin" in the Altfolio View has a much better flow. It now allows the next coin you tap on to be added to that particular altfolio as well as specifying the exact amount if you have the option turned on. If you don't go check out the Settings view in the app, there's some handy settings in there!
- Improved UX: Anytime you add a coin to an altfolio we detect if you already have that coin in there and show you the advanced controls for updating the current value.
- Improved UX: For new users (we can wait to ask about a passcode & push notifications)
- Crash Fix: We noticed some people were having a crash in the Altfolio View, this should fix that.
- You've always been able to swipe on coin rows in every view, now we show a little reminder for new users (coming soon, a full tutorial mode for those who want it!)
- More data, more often. Now when you tap on a coin we'll grab that latest data for you, not all coins have socket data so no flashies but this should help make up for that and prevent you from having to do a pull to refresh for a particular coin.

Meh:
- Bug fixes
- Speed Improvements
- Even more UX improvements but we're not writing a novel here
- iOS 11 UI fixes, and just for giggles some iOS 10 compatibility

Cheers,
The ShapeShift Gang

- Optimized for iPhone X
- Complete support for FaceID (no matter the device)
- Improved UX: The app now detects your device's preferred currency and whether or not we support it natively. If we do then new users will have it set automagically. Existing users, we'll ask what you prefer!
- Altfolio Section Bug Fixes: We don't mind bugs but we don't like them in our software, dang homonyms!

The previous release (as it was so recent):
- Alerts are working again
- New Sort Option: Market Cap by % Change
- Faster Intro Animation
- UI/UX Updates

- Optimized for iPhone X
- Complete support for FaceID (no matter the device)
- Improved UX: The app now detects your device's preferred currency and whether or not we support it natively. If we do then new users will have it set automagically. Existing users, we'll ask what you prefer!
- Altfolio Section Bug Fixes: We don't mind bugs but we don't like them in our software, dang homonyms!

The previous release (as it was so recent):
- Alerts are working again
- New Sort Option: Market Cap by % Change
- Faster Intro Animation
- UI/UX Updates

NOTE: A recent library update caused a break for users whose currency system uses the comma (,) for the decimal place, we've submitted a fix for this issue, look for 1.4.1 in the very near future!

- Night Modes! You asked, we listened! Now you can set the app's theme at the bottom of the settings view inside the app. Choose between the original white design as well as gray or black for less strain on the eyes at night and a bit more battery life from your device.

- UX Improvement: Small tweaks to the altfolio & coin detail views allow for more data to be shown as well as making the manual pull to refresh easier.

- Rare crash in settings view fixed

- Behind the scenes code improvements

1.4.1: Crash Fixes, darn library updates failing to actually be backwards compatible caused a crash when using a separator other than the period for the decimal place. We found one more issue for some country's decimal separator, the fix will be available in release 1.4.2 very shortly.

1.4: Night Modes! You asked, we listened! Now you can set the app's theme at the bottom of the settings view inside the app. Choose between the original white design as well as gray or black for less strain on the eyes at night and a bit more battery life from your device.

UX Improvement: Small tweaks to the altfolio & coin detail views allow for more data to be shown as well as making the manual pull to refresh easier.

Other miscellaneous techy improvements

- Found some more countries whose decimal separator wasn't playing nicely, we had a quick UN meeting, it should be all sorted out now!
- Improved Flash logic (Web Sockets), now using even less data for better performance
- Night Mode UI Updates
- Bug Fixes

Meet CoinCap 2.0! With a redesigned look and enhanced functionality, your favorite source for real-time market data just got even better.

What's New?
Altfolio History: Precisely track the performance of your favorite assets thanks to hundreds of exchange data sources
Altfolio Customization: Input individual trades to view historical performance and overall cost-basis by asset
Watchlist: Track your favorite assets all in one place.
New Look: Now in dark mode only-may your screen be as dark as your heart
Bug Fixes: Say hello to a clean and reliable app.

Howdy Folks! This release has a lot of work in various areas as it will likely be the last build before Version 2.0, henceforth known as V2 (no need to reinvent the wheel). We hope you enjoy it!

Privacy Mode:
- A new Altfolio feature that you can fully disable if you won't use it or don't like it :)
- Each time you open the app (or bring it back from the background) your private altfolio info (overall altfolio value & each token's quantity and private value) will be hidden by default.
- Tap on the eyeball icon at the top to make everything visible for the session.
- Tap again at the top to make everything private again, it's that easy.
- If you're in a very public area (cafe, public transit, etc) but you want to see a token's private info then tap on the right hand side of the row and the details will show for a couple of seconds before automatically hiding again!

iPad & iPad Pro:
- Improved UX for both Standard & Enhanced Multitasking views
- Improved UX on rotation

Nerdloggery:
- Bug Fixes: Coins with spaces once again pull down their images properly, settings would occasionally auto-scroll to the bottom, etc
- Graphs let you know when they're loading (slow connections, you're welcome!)
- Improved User Alerts: We've added a settings button which will automatically open the app's settings panel and scroll to the relevant area (Night Mode, Privacy Mode, etc.)
- Improved UI/UX: Less visual noise, no more grey mode, icons for Night Mode

- Introducing Night Mode Scheduler, automatically have the theme of the app change whenever you'd like.
- Holy flashing cells Batman! We've changed how we display buys and sells so the app is faster and more usable.

We're still working on V2 and would like to hear from you! Visit www.surveymonkey.com/r/CoinCap to take this 5 minute survey and enter to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card.

Meet CoinCap 2.0! With a redesigned look and enhanced functionality, your favorite source for real-time market data just got even better.

What's New?
Altfolio History: Precisely track the performance of your favorite assets thanks to hundreds of exchange data sources
Altfolio Customization: Input individual trades to view historical performance and overall cost-basis by asset
Watchlist: Track your favorite assets all in one place.
New Look: Now in dark mode only-may your screen be as dark as your heart
Bug Fixes: Say hello to a clean and reliable app.

Big things are coming! Save your Altfolios to get ready for our beautiful new app. Simply update to v1.5.1 and open your CoinCap app to transfer your Altfolios over to CoinCap 2.0, coming next month!

How to save your Altfolios
1. Install update 1.5.1
2. Open the updated CoinCap app
3. Get ready - a better experience is coming soon!

- App updated to use v2 APIs & Sockets
- Assets now show rank in their details and on the home/search page
- New asset images
- More currencies available for value translations
- Speed improvements
- Small bug fixes

-Updated App Iconography
-Removed Alerts Section (as it's no longer working until the improved V2 release)
-Bug Fixes
- Swift 4 decided to break some of our code, this should fix that issue! Good old growing pains!

-Updated App Iconography
-Removed Alerts Section (as it's no longer working until the improved V2 release)
-Bug Fixes

- Assets now show rank in their details and on the home/search page
- New asset images
- More currencies available for value translations
- Speed improvements
- Small bug fixes

Upgrade's to support iOS 13 and dark mode.
Add links to SS App store.  Add ability to set home screen.

What’s new:
1. Turn your altfolios into real portfolios with an easy way to download the new ShapeShift mobile app to create your new self custody mobile wallet.
2. Fixed bugs and improved the app performance
